remarks: The trace of a composition of translations is less than or equal to the join of their traces.  Part of proof of Lemma G of [Crawley] p. 116, second paragraph on p. 117.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-2013.)
statement:
trlco.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
trlco.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
trlco.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlco.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlco.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlco $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ G e. T ) -> ( R ` ( F o. G ) ) .<_ ( ( R ` F ) .\/ ( R ` G ) ) ) $.
